body:
### Experimenting with Github Pages
I like the idea of having a simple version controlled weblog based on github.
Let's see if this motivates me more than using the wordpress installation over at [shawn.co](http://shawn.co) 

Sample code support:
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
name: scarrillo@github
